trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of XML Schema documents for use in populating a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os locais de arquivos de documentos de esquema XML a serem usados para popular um documento de descoberta de serviços Web.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern> classe herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> classe e empregado pelo <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> método, que manipula uma solicitação HTTP para um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, nenhuma dessas classes precisa ser usada diretamente por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.XmlSchemaSearchPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: The file system path of the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do sistema de arquivos do documento do esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference" /> object for a given discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference" /> para um documento de descoberta especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference" /> object that specifies the file name for an XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference" /> que especifica o nome do arquivo de um documento de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
trans-unit.target: O concreto <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> classe herda da <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> instance contains the location of the .xsd file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> instância contém o local do arquivo. xsd.

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de nome de arquivo a ser usado como um destino de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.xsd" indicates an XML Schema document extension.
trans-unit.target: O padrão "xsd" indica uma extensão de documento de esquema XML.
